typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> RawEnergyLogs
RawEnergyLogs foldDown(unroll(UserFilter.ResultsAll),
	mapColumn(
		MarketId,
		Results,
		TrackingGuidJs,
		ip,
		websiteid,
		partnerid,
		sessionid,
		url,
		actioncode,
		filterid,
		webserver,
		contractclassificationid,
		azureblobstorageurl,
		azureblobstoragesas,
		azuretablestorageurl,
		PurchaseId = UserFilter.ResultsAll.PurchaseId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenResults
